title: ISic002940. I.Sicily inscription 002940
body:
1[Ἀρτε]μ̣ιδώρα Νύμφωνος τὸν αὐτάστα πατέρα̣
2[Ἀρτέ]μωνα Ἀλείδα γυμνασιαρχήσαντα
3[ἀνέθ]ηκε κατὰ διαθήκαν

1[....].ΙΔΩΡΑΝΥΜΦΩΝΟΣΤΟΝΑΥΤΑΣΤΑΠΑΤΕΡ.
2[....]ΜΩΝΑΑΛΕΙΔΑΓΥΜΝΑΣΙΑΡΧΗΣΑΝΤΑ
3[....]ΗΚΕΚΑΤΑΔΙΑΘΗΚΑΝ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of I.Segesta

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Artemidora wife of Nymphon dedicated (this statue of) her own father, Artemon son of Aleidas, gymnasiarch, according to the terms of the will.

Italian translation

http://zotero.org/groups/382445/items/3PK3JKXR

Artemidora, moglie di Nynmphon, ha dedicato (la statua del) suo proprio padre Artemon figlio di Aleidas, ginnasiarca, per testamento [transl. from I.Segesta]

commentary
